DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional, post-marketing observational study was conducted to obtain data, such as safety and effectiveness, from the use of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra) in clinical practice and investigate the necessity to conduct a follow-up post-marketing clinical study in Japan.
DOC.criteria: All patients prescribed Kaletra for the treatment of HIV are eligible for this survey. Contraindications according to the Package Insert: Patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any ingredient of Kaletra Patients who are receiving pimozide, cisapride, ergotamine tartrate, dihydroergotamine mesylate, ergometrine maleate, methylergometrine maleate, midazolam, triazolam, vardenafil hydrochloride hydrate, boriconazol
